break-lock¶

Purpose

Break a dead lock.

Usage

brz break-lock [LOCATION]

Options
--config

LOCATION is the directory where the config lock is.

--force

Do not ask for confirmation before breaking the lock.

-h, --help

Show help message.

-q, --quiet

Only display errors and warnings.

--usage

Show usage message and options.

-v, --verbose

Display more information.

Description

This command breaks a lock on a repository, branch, working directory or config file.

CAUTION: Locks should only be broken when you are sure that the process holding the lock has been stopped.

You can get information on what locks are open via the ‘brz info [location]’ command.

Examples

brz break-lock brz break-lock brz+ssh://example.com/brz/foo brz break-lock –conf ~/.config/breezy
